casebody.data:
Robert Andrew BARTLETT, Sr.
v.
Eric A. HOOKS, Secretary, North Carolina Department of Public Safety No. 236P06-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 27, 2018 Robert Andrew Bartlett, Sr., for Robert A. Bartlett, Sr., for State. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Hooks, Erik A. (N.C.D.P.S. Secretary).

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 27th of September 2018 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Orange County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of September 2018."
